info.title: Real Estate Usage Enablement and Occupancy Group Type
info.description: The service consists of the Usage Enablement and Occupancy Group Type as well as its text resolution. The service only supports read operations. If there are any issues during processing, the system displays error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Read Real Estate Usage Enablement and Occupancy Group Types using this inbound service
